## ValidationResult.filter() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates a new `ValidationResult` by filtering this one, using the given `ValidationIssueFilter` as the inclusion predicate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filter(includePredicate: ValidationIssueFilter): ValidationResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  includePredicate | [ValidationIssueFilter](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissuefilter.md) | The predicate that determines whether a certain issue should be included in the result |

**Returns:**

[ValidationResult](./3d-tiles-validator.validationresult.md)

The filtered result
